Testing FPREM1 instruction
FPREM1 computes IEEE754-compatible partial remainder

Test case 1:
Dividend: 10.00000000000000000000 (0x4002a000000000000000)
Divisor: 3.00000000000000000000 (0x4000c000000000000000)
Expected: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Result: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x7800
Tag Word:     0x7800
Top: 7
C0: 0, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 1
Exceptions: 
PASS

Test case 2:
Dividend: 15.00000000000000000000 (0x4002f000000000000000)
Divisor: 4.00000000000000000000 (0x40018000000000000000)
Expected: -1.00000000000000000000 (0xbfff8000000000000000)
Result: -1.00000000000000000000 (0xbfff8000000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x3100
Tag Word:     0x3100
Top: 6
C0: 1, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 0
Exceptions: 
PASS

Test case 3:
Dividend: 7.00000000000000000000 (0x4001e000000000000000)
Divisor: 2.50000000000000000000 (0x4000a000000000000000)
Expected: -0.50000000000000000000 (0xbffe8000000000000000)
Result: -0.50000000000000000000 (0xbffe8000000000000000)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x6800
Tag Word:     0x6800
Top: 5
C0: 0, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 1
Exceptions: 
PASS

Test case 4:
Dividend: 1.00000000000000000000 (0x3fff8000000000000000)
Divisor: 0.30000000000000000001 (0x3ffd999999999999999a)
Expected: 0.09999999999999999997 (0x3ffbccccccccccccccc8)
Result: 0.09999999999999999997 (0x3ffbccccccccccccccc8)
Control Word: 0x037f
Status Word:  0x6000
Tag Word:     0x6000
Top: 4
C0: 0, C1: 0, C2: 0, C3: 1
Exceptions: 
PASS

FPREM1 test completed
